comments:
Eclipse crashed when a mouse drag select was attempted in
a java source file. This was in Plugin Package Perspective,
in Package Explorer, with a java source file selected and
displayed in an edit window.

Following are the logs for 
	crashreporter, and
	.metadata/

This was on Mac OS 10.2.2
